item.title: Release 1.0
item.description: It is a long way to reach the 1.0 release.

item.title: How cordova-plugin-admobpro works
item.description: I believe most cordova-plugin-admobpro users do not know how the plugin works, as the author does not explain it or intentionally hide it. This blog post is going to uncover the details, so users could have better understanding about what is added to their projects.

item.title: History of cordova-plugin-admob-free
item.description: 2 years ago, I have a cordova project needed to add Google AdMob for showing ads. I was searching an open source solution, soon landed to the popular cordova-plugin-admobpro.
